Texts.Chs: 幸运的是，我和大多数学者不同。我遇到了一个废墟... 我会暂时保守位置的秘密。萨沙... 你不会相信的！图书馆。一座庞大的，保存完好的，功能齐全的图书馆。毫无疑问，其中的信息是整个宇宙历史上最重要的考古发现。所有我需要做的就是去参加地球上的会议，然后我可以在大地保护团的紧急峰会之后提交我的发现。
Texts.Eng: Fortunately, most scholars aren't me. I came across a ruin...I'll keep the location secret for now. Sasha...you won't believe it! A library. A massive, well-preserved and fully functioning library. The information within is, without a doubt, the most significant archaeological find in the history of the entire cosmos. All I need to do is make it to the meeting on Earth and I can present my findings after the Protectorate emergency summit.

Texts.Chs: 零散的知识构成了我们所知道的关于这个种族的整个基础，我们称之为先驱。很大程度上是因为我们没有办法知道他们怎么称呼自己。没有任何文字提到他们的族称诨名。没有人提到他们的家乡，行星，体制... 如果他们不是仇外者的话，那么他们就是格外的保护者和偏执狂。
Texts.Eng: Scattered knowledge makes up the entire base of what we know about the race we refer to as the Precursors. Largely because we have no way to know what they called themselves. No text ever speaks of their species identification. Nothing ever mentions a homeworld, star, system...if they were xenophobes they were exceptionally protective and paranoid ones.
